content: *note this is the ad-free printable pdf version of this pattern you can find the free pattern at https //theturtletrunk com/pumpkin-beanie-crochet-pattern/* this crochet pumpkin beanie pattern works up quickly and easily it features a ribbed texture and cute stem and vines to look like a pumpkin this crochet pattern includes 6 sizes so you can make one for anyone and everyone in the family it ll be perfect for fall family photos trips to the pumpkin patch and for fall newborn pictures difficulty easy sizes included 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 1-3 years 3-10 years and adult supples needed - medium 4 weight yarn in orange and green - 5 50mm i crochet hook - yarn needle - scissors pattern includes - gauge pattern - special stitch instructions - link to free + full video tutorial - detailed instructions for 6 sizes
